channel.title: Reload item

item.title: Reload item
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

How do I reload item.java(position to wear item)? I already have something that reloads all classes when I compile(JRebel). The thing is it doesnâ€™t change the position when I put in the codes. I made this code, but it DCs everyone when I use it. if(command.startsWith("newitem") && playerRights > 0){ sM("Items refreshed!"); server.itemHandler = new ItemHandler(); }Any ideas?

Read full topic
